values:
With mostly everyone turning into little idiotic children, this city has become more obnoxious than usual!

I wonder what other curse will this city put on us.

I slept in for a long time in my case, hoping this would just be some dream and that I haven't be wound up yet...Of course, I was mistaken. Opened my case yesterday to see if I was back where I was supposed to be and instead I see the silly humans and other beings...speaking in different languages from one another. I thought it was a dream and went back to sleep. Awoke today, and it defenetly wasn't a dream, since everyone seems to be talking about it. Heh, well I'm certainly glad I didn't take part in any of it. I guess my investigation continues. To try and get out...or to see if my other little sisters are here~ *chuckles* I'm off to explore the city. *closes her case and flies off* EDIT- So, I've heard some talk about the end of the world. End of the world? I can't let that happen yet! I have to become Alice! The Alice Game WILL continue! I won't let a stupid thing like this ruin everything! I've got to find a way to stop all of this and get back to where those little runts are! I will not give up due to these news!

*opens her case quickly*

...

*breathes heavily*

...What in hell was that?! I...couldn't wake up no matter what! This city...

*gets out of her case and closes it*

...I'm not giving up, Shinku. I WILL become Alice! 

*flies off*
---

((OOC:Suigintou had a nightmare where she was being broken into pieces by all the other Rozen Maiden dolls. Especially Shinku. Also dreamt that she could never reach her "Father"))

This is certainly a weird place. From "private investigators" to a "lord of darkness"...how interesting. Certainly more interesting than that other place. Heh, even met a little kitten~ But... Uhnn...why do I feel so tired all of the sudden..? And why am I having...these thoughts? *stumbles towards her case and opens it* ...it must be this city's doing..!! Unghh... ...I wonder...if this...is how Megu feels...like-- *collapses in her case and it closes shut* ((OOC: A bit of a warning. Bother Suigintou by opening the case and you will get attacked. You'll have the great [/sarcasm] job of putting her back in the case. ;P))

After finding myself in this never-ending ocean of flowers, I find this odd-looking city. Just where am I?! And why isn't the N. Field working? Does this have to do with that pretentious little sister of mine?! Ugh...how annoying. ...wait a second. She took my Rosa Mystica. I wasn't supposed to come back. But here I am...and with a torso?! Father...where are you? What's the meaning of this? ... Megu...I wonder how she's doing... I will not lose! I will become Alice no matter what! I'll have to gather more information on this city. EDIT- What is this loud ticking noise? It's getting to be...a bit annoying.
